Rules.InvariantScript: Table({Value: 1, MainColor: ThisItem.Value},{Value: 2, MainColor: ThisItem.Value},{Value: 3, MainColor: ThisItem.Value},{Value: 4, MainColor: ThisItem.Value},{Value: 5, MainColor: ThisItem.Value},{Value: 6, MainColor: ThisItem.Value})

Table({Value: 1, MainColor: ThisItem.Value},{Value: 2, MainColor: ThisItem.Value},{Value: 3, MainColor: ThisItem.Value},{Value: 4, MainColor: ThisItem.Value},{Value: 5, MainColor: ThisItem.Value},{Value: 6, MainColor: ThisItem.Value})
galDarkColorsCP.Y + galDarkColorsCP.Height + CompColorPicker.ColorSquaresPadding * 2 + recMainColorCP.Height + CompColorPicker.ColorSquaresPadding * 2 + galLightColorsCP.Height

Mid(
    "0123456789ABCDEF",
    1 + (txtRedValueCP.Text - Mod(
        txtRedValueCP.Text,
        16
    )) / 16,
    1
) & Mid(
    "0123456789ABCDEF",
    1 + Mod(
        txtRedValueCP.Text,
        16
    ),
    1
) & Mid(
    "0123456789ABCDEF",
    1 + (txtGreenValueCP.Text - Mod(
        txtGreenValueCP.Text,
        16
    )) / 16,
    1
) & Mid(
    "0123456789ABCDEF",
    1 + Mod(
        txtGreenValueCP.Text,
        16
    ),
    1
) & Mid(
    "0123456789ABCDEF",
    1 + (txtBlueValueCP.Text - Mod(
        txtBlueValueCP.Text,
        16
    )) / 16,
    1
) & Mid(
    "0123456789ABCDEF",
    1 + Mod(
        txtBlueValueCP.Text,
        16
    ),
    1
) & Mid(
    "0123456789ABCDEF",
    1 + (Round(txtAlphaValueCP.Text * 255, 0) - Mod(
        Round(txtAlphaValueCP.Text * 255, 0),
        16
    )) / 16,
    1
) & Mid(
    "0123456789ABCDEF",
    1 + Mod(
        Round(txtAlphaValueCP.Text * 255, 0),
        16
    ),
    1
)

Table(
    {Index: 1, Value: "#ff0000"},
    {Index: 2, Value: "#fd4015"},
    {Index: 3, Value: "#fd8018"},
    {Index: 4, Value: "#fcc01c"},
    {Index: 5, Value: "#ffff00"},
    {Index: 6, Value: "#bdff1e"},
    {Index: 7, Value: "#7dff1b"},
    {Index: 8, Value: "#3dff1a"},
    {Index: 9, Value: "#00ff00"},
    {Index: 10, Value: "#00ff44"},
    {Index: 11, Value: "#09ff81"},
    {Index: 12, Value: "#12ffbf"},
    {Index: 13, Value: "#1afffe"},
    {Index: 14, Value: "#1bbffd"},
    {Index: 15, Value: "#1c7efc"},
    {Index: 16, Value: "#1c3dfc"},
    {Index: 17, Value: "#0000ff"},
    {Index: 18, Value: "#4600fc"},
    {Index: 19, Value: "#8300fc"},
    {Index: 20, Value: "#c100fc"},
    {Index: 21, Value: "#ff00ff"},
    {Index: 22, Value: "#fe00be"},
    {Index: 23, Value: "#fd0180"},
    {Index: 24, Value: "#fd0642"},
    {Index: 25, Value: "#617c8a"}
)

// ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
// -- UltimateColorPicker component
// ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
// -- Author: Emmanuel GALLIS (on Twitter: @R3dKap)
// -- Created: 08-sep-2019
// -- First published: 29-nov-2019
// ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
// -- History
// -- 23-oct-2019 (v1.0): initial version
// -- 01-dec-2019 (v1.1): added greyscale palette + fixed component auto-size + fixed
//                        positionning of some controls + grouped controls inside
//                        containers + prefixed hex output with "#"
// ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
// No button selected
Set(
    locSelectedButton,
    Blank()
);
// Set local default color to component's default color
Set(
    locDefaultColor,
    Right(
        CompColorPicker.DefaultColor,
        Len(CompColorPicker.DefaultColor) - 1
    )
);
// Set current color red value based on default color
Set(
    locPickedColorRed,
    Switch(
        Right(
            Left(
                locDefaultColor,
                2
            ),
            1
        ),
        "A",
        10,
        "B",
        11,
        "C",
        12,
        "D",
        13,
        "E",
        14,
        "F",
        15,
        Right(
            Left(
                locDefaultColor,
                2
            ),
            1
        )
    ) + Switch(
        Left(
            Left(
                locDefaultColor,
                2
            ),
            1
        ),
        "A",
        10,
        "B",
        11,
        "C",
        12,
        "D",
        13,
        "E",
        14,
        "F",
        15,
        Left(
            Left(
                locDefaultColor,
                2
            ),
            1
        )
    ) * 16
);
// Set current color green value based on default color
Set(
    locPickedColorGreen,
    Switch(
        Right(
            Mid(
                locDefaultColor,
                3,
                2
            ),
            1
        ),
        "A",
        10,
        "B",
        11,
        "C",
        12,
        "D",
        13,
        "E",
        14,
        "F",
        15,
        Right(
            Mid(
                locDefaultColor,
                3,
                2
            ),
            1
        )
    ) + Switch(
        Left(
            Mid(
                locDefaultColor,
                3,
                2
            ),
            1
        ),
        "A",
        10,
        "B",
        11,
        "C",
        12,
        "D",
        13,
        "E",
        14,
        "F",
        15,
        Left(
            Mid(
                locDefaultColor,
                3,
                2
            ),
            1
        )
    ) * 16
);
// Set current color blue value based on default color
Set(
    locPickedColorBlue,
    Switch(
        Right(
            Mid(
                locDefaultColor,
                5,
                2
            ),
            1
        ),
        "A",
        10,
        "B",
        11,
        "C",
        12,
        "D",
        13,
        "E",
        14,
        "F",
        15,
        Right(
            Mid(
                locDefaultColor,
                5,
                2
            ),
            1
        )
    ) + Switch(
        Left(
            Mid(
                locDefaultColor,
                5,
                2
            ),
            1
        ),
        "A",
        10,
        "B",
        11,
        "C",
        12,
        "D",
        13,
        "E",
        14,
        "F",
        15,
        Left(
            Mid(
                locDefaultColor,
                5,
                2
            ),
            1
        )
    ) * 16
);
// Set current color alpha value based on default color
Set(
    locAlpha,
    If(
        Mid(
            locDefaultColor,
            7,
            2
        ) <> "",
        ((Switch(
            Right(
                Mid(
                    locDefaultColor,
                    7,
                    2
                ),
                1
            ),
            "A",
            10,
            "B",
            11,
            "C",
            12,
            "D",
            13,
            "E",
            14,
            "F",
            15,
            Right(
                Mid(
                    locDefaultColor,
                    7,
                    2
                ),
                1
            )
        ) + Switch(
            Left(
                Mid(
                    locDefaultColor,
                    7,
                    2
                ),
                1
            ),
            "A",
            10,
            "B",
            11,
            "C",
            12,
            "D",
            13,
            "E",
            14,
            "F",
            15,
            Left(
                Mid(
                    locDefaultColor,
                    7,
                    2
                ),
                1
            )
        ) * 16) / 255) * 100,
        100
    )
);
// Initialize black to white palette (first color is Black)
ClearCollect(
    locBlackWhiteColors,
    {Value: "#000000"}
);
// Build black to white palette (same number of shades than number of main colors)
ForAll(
    CompColorPicker.MainColors,
    If(
        Index > 1 && Index < CountRows(CompColorPicker.MainColors),// Skip first and last colors as they are respectively black and white
        Collect(
            locBlackWhiteColors,
            {
                Value: "#" & Switch(// Greyscale first digit for red value
                    RoundDown(
                        Index * (255 / CountRows(CompColorPicker.MainColors)) / 16,
                        0
                    ),
                    10,
                    "A",
                    11,
                    "B",
                    12,
                    "C",
                    13,
                    "D",
                    14,
                    "E",
                    15,
                    "F",
                    Text(
                        RoundDown(
                            Index * (255 / CountRows(CompColorPicker.MainColors)) / 16,
                            0
                        )
                    )
                ) & Switch(// Greyscale second digit for red value
                    RoundDown(
                        Mod(
                            Index * (255 / CountRows(CompColorPicker.MainColors)),
                            16
                        ),
                        0
                    ),
                    10,
                    "A",
                    11,
                    "B",
                    12,
                    "C",
                    13,
                    "D",
                    14,
                    "E",
                    15,
                    "F",
                    Text(
                        RoundDown(
                            Mod(
                                Index * (255 / CountRows(CompColorPicker.MainColors)),
                                16
                            ),
                            0
                        )
                    )
                ) & Switch(// Greyscale first digit for green value (same as red)
                    RoundDown(
                        Index * (255 / CountRows(CompColorPicker.MainColors)) / 16,
                        0
                    ),
                    10,
                    "A",
                    11,
                    "B",
                    12,
                    "C",
                    13,
                    "D",
                    14,
                    "E",
                    15,
                    "F",
                    Text(
                        RoundDown(
                            Index * (255 / CountRows(CompColorPicker.MainColors)) / 16,
                            0
                        )
                    )
                ) & Switch(// Greyscale second digit for green value (same as red)
                    RoundDown(
                        Mod(
                            Index * (255 / CountRows(CompColorPicker.MainColors)),
                            16
                        ),
                        0
                    ),
                    10,
                    "A",
                    11,
                    "B",
                    12,
                    "C",
                    13,
                    "D",
                    14,
                    "E",
                    15,
                    "F",
                    Text(
                        RoundDown(
                            Mod(
                                Index * (255 / CountRows(CompColorPicker.MainColors)),
                                16
                            ),
                            0
                        )
                    )
                ) & Switch(// Greyscale first digit for blue value (same as red and green)
                    RoundDown(
                        Index * (255 / CountRows(CompColorPicker.MainColors)) / 16,
                        0
                    ),
                    10,
                    "A",
                    11,
                    "B",
                    12,
                    "C",
                    13,
                    "D",
                    14,
                    "E",
                    15,
                    "F",
                    Text(
                        RoundDown(
                            Index * (255 / CountRows(CompColorPicker.MainColors)) / 16,
                            0
                        )
                    )
                ) & Switch(// Greyscale second digit for blue value (same as red and green)
                    RoundDown(
                        Mod(
                            Index * (255 / CountRows(CompColorPicker.MainColors)),
                            16
                        ),
                        0
                    ),
                    10,
                    "A",
                    11,
                    "B",
                    12,
                    "C",
                    13,
                    "D",
                    14,
                    "E",
                    15,
                    "F",
                    Text(
                        RoundDown(
                            Mod(
                                Index * (255 / CountRows(CompColorPicker.MainColors)),
                                16
                            ),
                            0
                        )
                    )
                )
            }
        )
    )
);
// Add last color to black and white palette: white
Collect(
    locBlackWhiteColors,
    {Value: "#FFFFFF"}
);

CustomProperties.Name: Title
CustomProperties.Tooltip: Text to display as the component title

CustomProperties.Name: ShowTitle
CustomProperties.Tooltip: Shows or hide the title bar of the color picker

CustomProperties.Name: MainColors
CustomProperties.Tooltip: Table with the list of main colors used to generate the various shades of each color

CustomProperties.Name: ShadesCount
CustomProperties.Tooltip: Number of shades to generate for each main color

CustomProperties.Name: ColorSquareSize
CustomProperties.Tooltip: Size of one color square that will be applied to all color squares in the palette (in pixels)

CustomProperties.Name: ColorSquaresPadding
CustomProperties.Tooltip: Padding between each color squares (in pixels)

CustomProperties.Name: SelectedColorBg
CustomProperties.Tooltip: Color for the background behind the selected color square

CustomProperties.Name: TitleColor
CustomProperties.Tooltip: Text color for the component's title

CustomProperties.Name: HideAuthor
CustomProperties.Tooltip: Hides the author from the title bar

CustomProperties.Name: HideVersion
CustomProperties.Tooltip: Hides the component's version number from the title bar
